abstract: Matching food with wine is an art. And while not everyone can agree on good art, everyone can agree on what is bad art.
snippet: Matching food with wine is an art. And while not everyone can agree on good art, everyone can agree on what is bad art.
lead_paragraph: AT a recent wine tasting in Napa, Calif., my hosts made a tragic mistake: They served a big zinfandel with warm apple pie for dessert. The sweet pie stripped the fruit flavors from the wine, leaving us with mouthfuls of what tasted like tannic water.

headline.main: I’ll Have Fries and a Glass of Your Best Champagne
headline.print_headline: I’ll Have Fries and a Glass Of Your Best Champagne

abstract: Samsung thinks it can crack Apple’s hold on the music player market.
snippet: Samsung thinks it can crack Apple’s hold on the music player market.
lead_paragraph: Samsung has bested Sony as the No. 1 maker of TVs in the United States. Now the Korean company has set its target on another company known for great design and unassailable market share.

abstract: As Steve Jobs was preparing to take the stage at the MacWorld trade show to make his buzz-drenched annual keynote address, pundits were piling on to excoriate him for Apple‘s options-backdating scandal.
lead_paragraph: As Steve Jobs was preparing to take the stage at the MacWorld trade show to make his buzz-drenched annual keynote address, pundits were piling on to excoriate him for Apple‘s options-backdating scandal.

headline.main: For Apple Chief, Gadgets’ Glitter Outshines Scandal

abstract: OK, so after three years of being wrong, the rumor sites were finally right. Now there IS an Apple cellphone. Or, rather, will be one in June.
snippet: OK, so after three years of being wrong, the rumor sites were finally right. Now there IS an Apple cellphone. Or, rather, will be one in June.
lead_paragraph: OK, so after three years of being wrong, the rumor sites were finally right. Now there IS an Apple cellphone. Or, rather, will be one in June.
